entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
